title: Donate to Orbital Temple
heading: Complete Your Donation
chooseHow: Choose how you would like to complete your tax-deductible donation:

option1.heading: Option 1: Donate Online Now
option1.description: Complete your donation immediately using credit card, debit card, or other online payment methods through our secure fiscal sponsor, The Field. You'll receive an instant tax receipt.

option2.heading: Option 2: Bank Deposit to The Roy Foundation
option2.description: Make a direct bank deposit or wire transfer to The Roy Foundation, our strategic partner and fiscal sponsor. This option is ideal for larger donations or international transfers.
option2.instructions: Please include "Orbital Temple - {donationType}" in the reference field. After completing your transfer, email us at sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art with your transfer details to receive your tax receipt.

taxInfo.heading: Tax-Deductible Giving
taxInfo.description: Orbital Temple is a fiscally sponsored project of The Field (Performance Zone Inc.), a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization. All U.S. contributions are tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law.
